fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Agriculture, Education and training, Environment, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Food Safety
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
- AiF - German Federation of Industrial Research Associations 
- BDP - German Plant Breeders Association 
- EPSO - European Plant Science Organisation
goals__remit: The German Federation for Plant Innovation is a research association and has a long-lasting experience supporting research projects of German plant breeders especially SMEs. The GFPi was founded in 1908 and has more than 60 members. The GFPi connects plant breeders and scientists from academia to initiate public-private-partnership and carry out collective research projects on a pre-competitive level.
